yāayyuhā al-nāsu ittaqū rabbakum inna zalzalata al-sāʿati shayon ʿaẓīmun
yawma tarawnahā tadhhalu kullu mur'ḍiʿatin ʿammā arḍaʿat wataḍaʿu kullu dhāti ḥamlin ḥamlahā watarā al-nāsa sukārā wamā hum bisukārā walākinna ʿadhāba al-lahi shadīdun
wamina al-nāsi man yujādilu fī al-lahi bighayri ʿil'min wayattabiʿu kulla shayṭānin marīdin
kutiba ʿalayhi annahu man tawallāhu fa-annahu yuḍilluhu wayahdīhi ilā ʿadhābi al-saʿīri

yāayyuhā al-nāsu in kuntum fī raybin mina al-baʿthi fa-innā khalaqnākum min turābin thumma min nuṭ'fatin thumma min ʿalaqatin thumma min muḍ'ghatin mukhallaqatin waghayri mukhallaqatin linubayyina lakum wanuqirru fī al-arḥāmi mā nashāu ilā ajalin musamman thumma nukh'rijukum ṭif'lan thumma litablughū ashuddakum waminkum man yutawaffā waminkum man yuraddu ilā ardhali al-ʿumuri likaylā yaʿlama min baʿdi ʿil'min shayan watarā al-arḍa hāmidatan fa-idhā anzalnā ʿalayhā al-māa ih'tazzat warabat wa-anbatat min kulli zawjin bahījin
dhālika bi-anna al-laha huwa al-ḥaqu wa-annahu yuḥ'yī al-mawtā wa-annahu ʿalā kulli shayin qadīrun
wa-anna al-sāʿata ātiyatun lā rayba fīhā wa-anna al-laha yabʿathu man fī al-qubūri
wamina al-nāsi man yujādilu fī al-lahi bighayri ʿil'min walā hudan walā kitābin munīrin
thāniya ʿiṭ'fihi liyuḍilla ʿan sabīli al-lahi lahu fī al-dun'yā khiz'yun wanudhīquhu yawma al-qiyāmati ʿadhāba al-ḥarīqi
dhālika bimā qaddamat yadāka wa-anna al-laha laysa biẓallāmin lil'ʿabīdi
wamina al-nāsi man yaʿbudu al-laha ʿalā ḥarfin fa-in aṣābahu khayrun iṭ'ma-anna bihi wa-in aṣābathu fit'natun inqalaba ʿalā wajhihi khasira al-dun'yā wal-ākhirata dhālika huwa al-khus'rānu al-mubīnu
yadʿū min dūni al-lahi mā lā yaḍurruhu wamā lā yanfaʿuhu dhālika huwa al-ḍalālu al-baʿīdu
yadʿū laman ḍarruhu aqrabu min nafʿihi labi'sa al-mawlā walabi'sa al-ʿashīru
inna al-laha yud'khilu alladhīna āmanū waʿamilū al-ṣāliḥāti jannātin tajrī min taḥtihā al-anhāru inna al-laha yafʿalu mā yurīdu
man kāna yaẓunnu an lan yanṣurahu al-lahu fī al-dun'yā wal-ākhirati falyamdud bisababin ilā al-samāi thumma l'yaqṭaʿ falyanẓur hal yudh'hibanna kayduhu mā yaghīẓu
wakadhālika anzalnāhu āyātin bayyinātin wa-anna al-laha yahdī man yurīdu
inna alladhīna āmanū wa-alladhīna hādū wal-ṣābiīna wal-naṣārā wal-majūsa wa-alladhīna ashrakū inna al-laha yafṣilu baynahum yawma al-qiyāmati inna al-laha ʿalā kulli shayin shahīdun

alam tara anna al-laha yasjudu lahu man fī al-samāwāti waman fī al-arḍi wal-shamsu wal-qamaru wal-nujūmu wal-jibālu wal-shajaru wal-dawābu wakathīrun mina al-nāsi wakathīrun ḥaqqa ʿalayhi al-ʿadhābu waman yuhini al-lahu famā lahu min muk'rimin inna al-laha yafʿalu mā yashāu
hādhāni khaṣmāni ikh'taṣamū fī rabbihim fa-alladhīna kafarū quṭṭiʿat lahum thiyābun min nārin yuṣabbu min fawqi ruūsihimu al-ḥamīmu
yuṣ'haru bihi mā fī buṭūnihim wal-julūdu
walahum maqāmiʿu min ḥadīdin
kullamā arādū an yakhrujū min'hā min ghammin uʿīdū fīhā wadhūqū ʿadhāba al-ḥarīqi
inna al-laha yud'khilu alladhīna āmanū waʿamilū al-ṣāliḥāti jannātin tajrī min taḥtihā al-anhāru yuḥallawna fīhā min asāwira min dhahabin walu'lu-an walibāsuhum fīhā ḥarīrun
wahudū ilā al-ṭayibi mina al-qawli wahudū ilā ṣirāṭi al-ḥamīdi

inna alladhīna kafarū wayaṣuddūna ʿan sabīli al-lahi wal-masjidi al-ḥarāmi alladhī jaʿalnāhu lilnnāsi sawāan al-ʿākifu fīhi wal-bādi waman yurid fīhi bi-il'ḥādin biẓul'min nudhiq'hu min ʿadhābin alīmin
wa-idh bawwanā li-ib'rāhīma makāna al-bayti an lā tush'rik bī shayan waṭahhir baytiya lilṭṭāifīna wal-qāimīna wal-rukaʿi al-sujūdi
wa-adhin fī al-nāsi bil-ḥaji yatūka rijālan waʿalā kulli ḍāmirin yatīna min kulli fajjin ʿamīqin
liyashhadū manāfiʿa lahum wayadhkurū is'ma al-lahi fī ayyāmin maʿlūmātin ʿalā mā razaqahum min bahīmati al-anʿāmi fakulū min'hā wa-aṭʿimū al-bāisa al-faqīra
thumma l'yaqḍū tafathahum walyūfū nudhūrahum walyaṭṭawwafū bil-bayti al-ʿatīqi
dhālika waman yuʿaẓẓim ḥurumāti al-lahi fahuwa khayrun lahu ʿinda rabbihi wa-uḥillat lakumu al-anʿāmu illā mā yut'lā ʿalaykum fa-ij'tanibū al-rij'sa mina al-awthāni wa-ij'tanibū qawla al-zūri
ḥunafāa lillahi ghayra mush'rikīna bihi waman yush'rik bil-lahi faka-annamā kharra mina al-samāi fatakhṭafuhu al-ṭayru aw tahwī bihi al-rīḥu fī makānin saḥīqin
dhālika waman yuʿaẓẓim shaʿāira al-lahi fa-innahā min taqwā al-qulūbi
lakum fīhā manāfiʿu ilā ajalin musamman thumma maḥilluhā ilā al-bayti al-ʿatīqi
walikulli ummatin jaʿalnā mansakan liyadhkurū is'ma al-lahi ʿalā mā razaqahum min bahīmati al-anʿāmi fa-ilāhukum ilāhun wāḥidun falahu aslimū wabashiri al-mukh'bitīna
alladhīna idhā dhukira al-lahu wajilat qulūbuhum wal-ṣābirīna ʿalā mā aṣābahum wal-muqīmī al-ṣalati wamimmā razaqnāhum yunfiqūna

wal-bud'na jaʿalnāhā lakum min shaʿāiri al-lahi lakum fīhā khayrun fa-udh'kurū is'ma al-lahi ʿalayhā ṣawāffa fa-idhā wajabat junūbuhā fakulū min'hā wa-aṭʿimū al-qāniʿa wal-muʿ'tara kadhālika sakharnāhā lakum laʿallakum tashkurūna
lan yanāla al-laha luḥūmuhā walā dimāuhā walākin yanāluhu al-taqwā minkum kadhālika sakharahā lakum litukabbirū al-laha ʿalā mā hadākum wabashiri al-muḥ'sinīna
inna al-laha yudāfiʿu ʿani alladhīna āmanū inna al-laha lā yuḥibbu kulla khawwānin kafūrin
udhina lilladhīna yuqātalūna bi-annahum ẓulimū wa-inna al-laha ʿalā naṣrihim laqadīrun

alladhīna ukh'rijū min diyārihim bighayri ḥaqqin illā an yaqūlū rabbunā al-lahu walawlā dafʿu al-lahi al-nāsa baʿḍahum bibaʿḍin lahuddimat ṣawāmiʿu wabiyaʿun waṣalawātun wamasājidu yudh'karu fīhā us'mu al-lahi kathīran walayanṣuranna al-lahu man yanṣuruhu inna al-laha laqawiyyun ʿazīzun
alladhīna in makkannāhum fī al-arḍi aqāmū al-ṣalata waātawū al-zakata wa-amarū bil-maʿrūfi wanahaw ʿani al-munkari walillahi ʿāqibatu al-umūri
wa-in yukadhibūka faqad kadhabat qablahum qawmu nūḥin waʿādun wathamūdu
waqawmu ib'rāhīma waqawmu lūṭin
wa-aṣḥābu madyana wakudhiba mūsā fa-amlaytu lil'kāfirīna thumma akhadhtuhum fakayfa kāna nakīri
faka-ayyin min qaryatin ahlaknāhā wahiya ẓālimatun fahiya khāwiyatun ʿalā ʿurūshihā wabi'rin muʿaṭṭalatin waqaṣrin mashīdin
afalam yasīrū fī al-arḍi fatakūna lahum qulūbun yaʿqilūna bihā aw ādhānun yasmaʿūna bihā fa-innahā lā taʿmā al-abṣāru walākin taʿmā al-qulūbu allatī fī al-ṣudūri
wayastaʿjilūnaka bil-ʿadhābi walan yukh'lifa al-lahu waʿdahu wa-inna yawman ʿinda rabbika ka-alfi sanatin mimmā taʿuddūna
waka-ayyin min qaryatin amlaytu lahā wahiya ẓālimatun thumma akhadhtuhā wa-ilayya al-maṣīru
qul yāayyuhā al-nāsu innamā anā lakum nadhīrun mubīnun
fa-alladhīna āmanū waʿamilū al-ṣāliḥāti lahum maghfiratun wariz'qun karīmun
wa-alladhīna saʿaw fī āyātinā muʿājizīna ulāika aṣḥābu al-jaḥīmi
wamā arsalnā min qablika min rasūlin walā nabiyyin illā idhā tamannā alqā al-shayṭānu fī um'niyyatihi fayansakhu al-lahu mā yul'qī al-shayṭānu thumma yuḥ'kimu al-lahu āyātihi wal-lahu ʿalīmun ḥakīmun
liyajʿala mā yul'qī al-shayṭānu fit'natan lilladhīna fī qulūbihim maraḍun wal-qāsiyati qulūbuhum wa-inna al-ẓālimīna lafī shiqāqin baʿīdin
waliyaʿlama alladhīna ūtū al-ʿil'ma annahu al-ḥaqu min rabbika fayu'minū bihi fatukh'bita lahu qulūbuhum wa-inna al-laha lahādi alladhīna āmanū ilā ṣirāṭin mus'taqīmin
walā yazālu alladhīna kafarū fī mir'yatin min'hu ḥattā tatiyahumu al-sāʿatu baghtatan aw yatiyahum ʿadhābu yawmin ʿaqīmin
al-mul'ku yawma-idhin lillahi yaḥkumu baynahum fa-alladhīna āmanū waʿamilū al-ṣāliḥāti fī jannāti al-naʿīmi
wa-alladhīna kafarū wakadhabū biāyātinā fa-ulāika lahum ʿadhābun muhīnun
wa-alladhīna hājarū fī sabīli al-lahi thumma qutilū aw mātū layarzuqannahumu al-lahu riz'qan ḥasanan wa-inna al-laha lahuwa khayru al-rāziqīna
layud'khilannahum mud'khalan yarḍawnahu wa-inna al-laha laʿalīmun ḥalīmun
dhālika waman ʿāqaba bimith'li mā ʿūqiba bihi thumma bughiya ʿalayhi layanṣurannahu al-lahu inna al-laha laʿafuwwun ghafūrun
dhālika bi-anna al-laha yūliju al-layla fī al-nahāri wayūliju al-nahāra fī al-layli wa-anna al-laha samīʿun baṣīrun
dhālika bi-anna al-laha huwa al-ḥaqu wa-anna mā yadʿūna min dūnihi huwa al-bāṭilu wa-anna al-laha huwa al-ʿaliyu al-kabīru
alam tara anna al-laha anzala mina al-samāi māan fatuṣ'biḥu al-arḍu mukh'ḍarratan inna al-laha laṭīfun khabīrun
lahu mā fī al-samāwāti wamā fī al-arḍi wa-inna al-laha lahuwa al-ghaniyu al-ḥamīdu
alam tara anna al-laha sakhara lakum mā fī al-arḍi wal-ful'ka tajrī fī al-baḥri bi-amrihi wayum'siku al-samāa an taqaʿa ʿalā al-arḍi illā bi-idh'nihi inna al-laha bil-nāsi laraūfun raḥīmun
wahuwa alladhī aḥyākum thumma yumītukum thumma yuḥ'yīkum inna al-insāna lakafūrun
likulli ummatin jaʿalnā mansakan hum nāsikūhu falā yunāziʿunnaka fī al-amri wa-ud'ʿu ilā rabbika innaka laʿalā hudan mus'taqīmin
wa-in jādalūka faquli al-lahu aʿlamu bimā taʿmalūna
al-lahu yaḥkumu baynakum yawma al-qiyāmati fīmā kuntum fīhi takhtalifūna
alam taʿlam anna al-laha yaʿlamu mā fī al-samāi wal-arḍi inna dhālika fī kitābin inna dhālika ʿalā al-lahi yasīrun
wayaʿbudūna min dūni al-lahi mā lam yunazzil bihi sul'ṭānan wamā laysa lahum bihi ʿil'mun wamā lilẓẓālimīna min naṣīrin

wa-idhā tut'lā ʿalayhim āyātunā bayyinātin taʿrifu fī wujūhi alladhīna kafarū al-munkara yakādūna yasṭūna bi-alladhīna yatlūna ʿalayhim āyātinā qul afa-unabbi-ukum bisharrin min dhālikumu al-nāru waʿadahā al-lahu alladhīna kafarū wabi'sa al-maṣīru

yāayyuhā al-nāsu ḍuriba mathalun fa-is'tamiʿū lahu inna alladhīna tadʿūna min dūni al-lahi lan yakhluqū dhubāban walawi ij'tamaʿū lahu wa-in yaslub'humu al-dhubābu shayan lā yastanqidhūhu min'hu ḍaʿufa al-ṭālibu wal-maṭlūbu
mā qadarū al-laha ḥaqqa qadrihi inna al-laha laqawiyyun ʿazīzun
al-lahu yaṣṭafī mina al-malāikati rusulan wamina al-nāsi inna al-laha samīʿun baṣīrun
yaʿlamu mā bayna aydīhim wamā khalfahum wa-ilā al-lahi tur'jaʿu al-umūru
yāayyuhā alladhīna āmanū ir'kaʿū wa-us'judū wa-uʿ'budū rabbakum wa-if'ʿalū al-khayra laʿallakum tuf'liḥūna

wajāhidū fī al-lahi ḥaqqa jihādihi huwa ij'tabākum wamā jaʿala ʿalaykum fī al-dīni min ḥarajin millata abīkum ib'rāhīma huwa sammākumu al-mus'limīna min qablu wafī hādhā liyakūna al-rasūlu shahīdan ʿalaykum watakūnū shuhadāa ʿalā al-nāsi fa-aqīmū al-ṣalata waātū al-zakata wa-iʿ'taṣimū bil-lahi huwa mawlākum faniʿ'ma al-mawlā waniʿ'ma al-naṣīru
